=Update=

  # backup your database and your "data" folder
  # (IMPORTANT: don't delete the "data" folder) delete all old files and folders (including "config") excluding the folder "data"
  # upload all new files and folders excluding the data folder (IMPORTANT: also upload the invisible .htaccess files)
  # open rsslounge in your browser and follow the install instructions
  # use your old database connection, the new rsslounge version will update the old database automatically
